alert.note: Alert for Lower Kobuk Valley; Northern Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 6:19AM AKST until January 12 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility occuring, and freezing rain expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting to 55 mph. * WHERE...Lower Kobuk Valley and Northern Seward Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds and ice accumulation could cause damage to power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility are expected now through this evening. Freezing rain is possible late tonight into Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Lower Kobuk Valley; Northern Seward Peninsula
